title: How to unsubscribe from Takflix
description: Takflix offers individual movie tickets and Tovarystvo memberships. To cancel your Takflix account, follow these steps:

steps_1.title: Delete Account via Takflix Platform
steps_1.description:
* Go to the "My Cinema" section on the Takflix platform.
* Select "Settings".
* Edit your personal profile data or change your password.
* Click "Block profile" to delete your account.

steps_2.title: Cancel Google Play Subscription
steps_2.description:
* To manage a Google Play subscription, follow the next steps.
* On your Android device, go to subscriptions in Google Play.
* Select the Takflix subscription you want to cancel.
* Tap cancel subscription and follow the instructions.

seo_text: Learn how to cancel your Takflix subscription. Follow our simple guide to unsubscribe from Takflix and manage your membership.
